pages.text: Sieving Sand and using the Iron Mesh will output:$(br)-Coal: 0.15$(br)-Apatite: 0.1$(br)-Cinnabar: 0.1$(br)-Potassium Nitrate: 0.1$(br)-Lapis Lazuli: 0.075$(br)-Prosperity Shard: 0.05$(br)-Salt: 0.05$(br)-Sulfur: 0.05$(br)-Uraninite: 0.05$(br)-Diamond: 0.03$(br)-Prismarine Shards: 0.03$(br)-Ametrine Gems: 0.02
